meanings.definition: An enzyme that catalyzes the hydrolysis of dipeptides into amino acids.
meanings.sent1: The dipeptidase helped break down the dipeptides.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study dipeptidases to understand how proteins are digested.
meanings.sent3: The dipeptidase joked, 'I turn dipeptides into amino acids; I'm a real protein superhero!'
meanings.sent4: The dipeptidase worked tirelessly, like a tiny molecular chef, turning dipeptides into amino acid ingredients.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the dipeptidase as a tiny scissors, snipping dipeptides into amino acid pieces.
